sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Firefighters in South Africa have found the bodies of more than 70 people after fire ripped through a Johannesburg building where homeless people were sleeping.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Experts say the war in Ukraine is reaching a pivotal point as Russia sends in reinforcements to try to prevent a breach of its defensive lines.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: As the coup leaders in Gabon name a new interim leader, the ousted president of the West African nation appears in a video and asks the world for help.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The 80th edition of the Venice Film Festival gets underway with the world premiere of Eduardo de Angelis' Italian war drama, Comandante.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: More than 70 people are reported to have been killed after fire ripped through a building in Johannesburg in South Africa.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The blaze broke out just before dawn and spread quickly.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The building is believed to have been occupied by up to 200 homeless people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: At least one child is among the fatalities and close to 50 other inhabitants were injured.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Firefighters located the bodies inside the building in the downtown area after the fire was brought under control.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Officials say they expect the death toll to rise.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The battle on Ukraine's eastern front is reaching a pivotal point in the war with Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Experts say Rybotnoy in the south and Kupyansk in Donetsk remain focal points of duelling offensives.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Ukraine's troops are coming under constant drone fire, but the mission remains to cleave out a land bridge between Russia and Crimea and cut off Moscow's forces in the occupied areas to the south.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The Russian command realises the dangers of a breakthrough.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Large reserves of the Russian armed forces have begun to arrive in the Robotina area.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: But neither army can function without ammunition, and Russian Defence Minister Sergei Shoigu has told workers at a military plant in the Tula region to set up non-stop round-the-clock production.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Shoigu has also recently traveled to North Korea to try to convince Pyongyang to sell artillery ammunition to Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Any arms deal between the DPRK and Russia would directly violate a number of UN Security Council resolutions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: We're continuing to monitor this situation closely and we urge the DPRK to cease its arms negotiations with Russia and abide by the public commitments that Pyongyang has made to not provide or sell arms to Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, Russian officials vowed that Tuesday night's drone attack on Peskov airport would not go unpunished.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Gabon's co-organisers have announced a new leader of the West African country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Here's General Bryce Oligui Nguema.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: And one of the first things he did was order the reconnection of international radio and television channels.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Officially named the transitional president, Nguema has not appeared in public in the three communiques made so far by the junta.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: But one person who has appeared is the deposed president Ali Bongo, who is under house arrest and has been accused of high treason against state institutions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: In a video released by an anonymous source, the president asks his friends around the world to speak out against the coup plotters.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile in the streets, there are signs of euphoria, but not in the way that Ali Bongo would appreciate.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Thousands of people are demonstrating their support for the coup that's put an end to his family's ruling dynasty, at least for now.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: They've been in power since 1967.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: The European Union is considering sanctions against Niger after military forces ousted President Bazoum last month, who was elected two years ago.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: Defense and foreign ministers of the bloc discussed various possibilities at an informal summit in Toledo, Spain.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: We are moving forward for an autonomous sanctions regime to take measures against the Putschists.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Work has already started.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: Niger is just the latest of a number of African countries where the army has seized control in recent years.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: Experts say that military coups seem to be contagious.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: This means that an unconstitutional takeover of power is no longer a taboo, a serious problem for Europe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Europe has real security concerns emanating from this region and also geopolitical concerns.

sentences.sentence: Security is related to Islamic fundamentalist terrorism, which has doubled in Mali since Europe and others have pulled out.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: And geopolitically, it comes down to Russia.

And now we're faced with the prospect, as Europe, of a belt of Russian influence along Europe's southern flank, if you consider this part of the Sahel in Africa as Europe's southern flank.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06

sentences.sentence: Niger was the EU's second largest raw uranium supplier after Kazakhstan last year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: But despite the recent crisis, an immediate threat to EU supplies doesn't look likely for the moment. Dziękuje za oglądanie. Bezpieczeństwo to militarne, bezpieczeństwo gospodarcze, bezpieczeństwo zdrowotne, bezpieczeństwo ekonomiczne, dlatego referendum jest potrzebne i zostanie przeprowadzone.

Dozens of organizations have also signed onto a letter addressed to the State Election Commission calling on it to include in its guidelines for regional commissions instructions on the right of voters to refuse to participate in the referendum.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: According to them, this would help the voters to make a fully informed decision.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Tropical storm Idalia heads for Georgia and the Carolinas after leaving a trail of destruction in Florida. Arriving in the Sunshine State Wednesday morning, winds of an estimated 200 kilometers per hour triggered a catastrophic storm surge.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: All states hit by the storm have had to declare a state of emergency.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Most coastal areas heeded the warning to evacuate, but some further inland thought they could brazen it after pure luck in previous hurricanes.

Anyone thinking of profiting from the situation has been warned with signs emblazoned with you loot we shoot. Meteorologists meanwhile say a rare blue supermoon could further raise tides above normal levels on top of Idalia's destructive impact.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: A blue supermoon is currently lighting up night skies, providing a celestial treat for stargazers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: To be clear, disappointingly, the moon isn't actually blue.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Rather, the sighting of this type of moon at this time only happens once in a blue moon.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: A supermoon means that the moon is reaching the point of its orbit at which it's closest to the Earth.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: That's why it looks its largest and seems to shine its brightest.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: A blue moon refers to the phenomenon that finds two supermoons taking place in one calendar month.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: It only comes about due to a special juggling of the dates in the year that results in 13 moons in a year, instead of the typical 12.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The last time a blue supermoon was seen was back in 2009 NASA says the next one won't happen until 2037 Venice rolls out the red carpet and fills with glamour at the opening of its

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The 80th edition of the Venice Film Festival kicked off with the Italian World War II film Comandante, which replaced Luca Guadagnino's Challengers due to the ongoing writers and actors' strikes in the US. It's a strong sub, as the film finds humanity in the darkest of places, as World War II submariners disobey their orders and save some of their enemies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: But the main talking point on the Lido at the moment is still the inclusion in the lineup of three controversial directors, Roman Polanski, Woody Allen, and Luc Besson.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: It remains to be seen how these films are received, but they will premiere in the coming days.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: From Venice, David Morricont, Euronews.
